Power analysis adopts hypothesis-testing method determine sample size accord several parameter include pre-specified significance level , desired power level expect effect size . Assuming two-tailed alpha 0.05 , probability 0.2 beta error ( 80 % power ) , effect size 0.28 calculate respect primary outcome measure ( self-efficacy ) result two previous research provide home visit telephone follow old adult , 200 subject per group require .
